mapper.select: select job_id, company_id, title, description, requirements, salary_range, location, status, create_time, update_time from tb_job_position where job_id = #{positionId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_job_position ( company_id, title, description, requirements, salary_range, location, status, create_time, update_time ) values ( #{companyId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{requirements}, #{salaryRange}, #{location}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
